stupidmodel.common
Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  stupidmodel.common.Constants

public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object

Dedicated class to store some model-specific constant values (e.g. bug vision ranges and context IDs) that is uninstantiable.

The different IDs are usually set in StupidModelContextBuilder.build(repast.simphony.context.Context) and used to access the shared structures (Grid, Space or Context) easily.

Final class, cannot be extended.

Since:
2.0-beta, 2011
Version:
$Id: Constants.java 149 2011-05-26 19:03:50Z richard.legendi@gmail.com $
Author:
Richard O. Legendi (richard.legendi)

PARAMETER_ID_BUG_COUNT

public static final java.lang.String PARAMETER_ID_BUG_COUNT
Unique ID for the parameter representing the initial number of bugs. It is set to 100 by default on the graphical interface.

Since:
Model 5
